blog.html:
Multiple Jenkins plugins received updates today that fix several security vulnerabilities.

  • Android Lint

  • CCM

  • Credentials Binding

  • JUnit

  • Pipeline: Supporting APIs

For an overview of these security fixes, see the security advisory.

Subscribe to the jenkinsci-advisories mailing list to receive important future notifications related to Jenkins security.
blog.title: Security updates for multiple Jenkins plugins

authors.html: Daniel is a Jenkins core maintainer and, as security officer, leads the Jenkins security team. He sometimes contributes to developer documentation and project infrastructure.
authors.name: Daniel Beck
